description: San is an antagonist from http://anidb.net/a6503 [Naruto Shippuuden 3: Inheritors of the Will of Fire]. He is a shinobi and one of http://anidb.net/ch16975 [Hiruko]`s three followers, along with http://anidb.net/ch17146 [Ichi] and http://anidb.net/ch17143 [Ni]. He almost perfectly resembles a mirror image of Ichi, except that he has three marks on his forehead.
name: San
